00006         <div id="comments">
00007 <?php
00008         $this->software->has_many('software_comments');
00009         $comments = $this->software->software_comments;
00010         $comments_count = count($comments);
00011 
00012         $comments_displayable = array();
00013         // first pass, filter comments that can be displayed
00014         for ($i = 0; $i < $comments_count; $i++)
00015         {
00016                 $comment = $comments[$i];
00017                 
00018                 if ($comment->approved ||
00019                         ($comment->author == @$_COOKIE['name'] &&
00020                         $comment->email == @$_COOKIE['email']))
00021                 {
00022                         $comments_displayable[] = $comment;
00023                 }
00024         }
00025         
00026         $comments_count = count($comments_displayable);
00027         $page_size = isset($_REQUEST['show_all']) ? $comments_count : 10;
00028 
00029         if ($comments_count > 0)
00030         {
00031                 $start = isset($_REQUEST['start']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['start']) ?
00032                         $_REQUEST['start'] : 0;
00033                 $first = max(0, $comments_count - $start - $page_size);
00034                 $last = $comments_count - $start;
00035                 
00036 ?>

00040                         </div>

00042 <?php

00044                 {

00048                                         'target' => 'software-content',
00049                                         'class' => 'fwd'));
